traitLibrary.arc: Can only target Detachments in specified Arc.
traitLibrary.armourbane: Successful Saves by Vehicles/Knights/Titans must be re-rolled.
traitLibrary.armorbane: Successful Saves by Vehicles/Knights/Titans must be re-rolled.
traitLibrary.assault: Double dice if within half range.
traitLibrary.barrage: Can target without LoS (suffers -1 to Hit).
traitLibrary.beam: Hits all models under a 1mm wide line.
traitLibrary.blast: Uses 3" or 5" template; hits based on models under template.
traitLibrary.bunker_buster: AP counts as double against Structures.
traitLibrary.burrowing: Counts as hitting Rear Arc; bypasses Void Shields.
traitLibrary.co_axial: Must target same unit as primary weapon.
traitLibrary.collapsing_singularity: Roll D6; on 1 firing model takes Wound, on 6 hits bypass Void Shields.
traitLibrary.firestorm: Uses Flame template; bypasses Cover Saves.
traitLibrary.light: Cannot damage Light Armoured vehicles or better.
traitLibrary.point_defence: Can be fired in Engagement phase against Infantry.
traitLibrary.rapid_fire: Any natural rolls of a 6 score 2 Hits instead of 1.
traitLibrary.ripple_fire: Re-roll failed Hit rolls if stationary.
traitLibrary.shock_pulse: Vehicles/Knights/Titans hit reduce Movement and Shield level.
traitLibrary.shred: Re-roll failed Wound rolls against Infantry/Cavalry.
traitLibrary.skyfire: Can target Flyers; -2 To Hit against non-Flyers.
traitLibrary.tracking: Re-roll failed Hit rolls against Flyers.
traitLibrary.warp: Bypasses Void Shields and Invulnerable Saves.
traitLibrary.pinning: Infantry units hit by this weapon take an extra Blast marker.
traitLibrary.web: Units hit by this weapon may not move in their next activation.
traitLibrary.hunger: When enemy slain, attacker regains 1 wound (up to max).
traitLibrary.attract: If target not killed, move closest model D6" towards attacker.
traitLibrary.parry: In Close Combat, force opponent to re-roll one die.
traitLibrary.shieldbane: Bypasses Void Shields even if AP is 0.
traitLibrary.heavy_barrage: Acts as Barrage; can damage Structures.
